entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 5:18 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: ENE 36 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
